review.classdesign.jammy.addons

Class ProcessSolverRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • review.classdesign.jammy.addons.ProcessSolverRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISolverRunner

    public class ProcessSolverRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISolverRunner
    ISolverRunner implementation used for language that are ran through a Process.
    Author:
    fv

    • Method Detail

      • isTerminated

        public boolean isTerminated()
        Indicates if this solver running step is terminated or not.
        Specified by:
        isTerminated in interface ISolverRunner
        Returns:
        true if this solver running is terminated, false otherwise.

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String arguments,
                java.lang.String output)
         throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Starts the solver running step, using the given arguments as execution input (provided through command line arguments). The provided output path should be used to write execution output.
        Specified by:
        run in interface ISolverRunner
        Parameters:
        arguments - Command line arguments to provide to the runner.
        output - Path of the output file on which solver output should be redirected.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - If any error occurs during execution.
